backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blogs, user emails, site-live state, and role-based access control with admin allow‑list bootstrapping.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report mapping two domain‑configuration features to their affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files, mainly marketing components, config, and styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for building, deploying, and managing maintenance mode for the IC application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point providing root mount, metadata, and script loader for the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, global providers, marketing layout, and admin‑gated sections with maintenance‑mode handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing login, denial, or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status feedback and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Collects student enquiry details and, upon submission, shows confirmation with WhatsApp, SMS, email, and call options.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Collects teacher application details and, upon submission, shows confirmation with messaging and contact options.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Displays a maintenance notice with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Site: Blocks public routes when the site is offline, showing maintenance or error states while allowing admin access.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Validates and submits a basic contact form, then shows a thank‑you screen.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Footer component with brand, navigation links, contact details, and social/WhatsApp/email handlers.
Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and routing actions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Contact section offering WhatsApp, call, SMS, and email actions with displayed numbers.
FAQ accordion rendering questions and answers from site content.
Hero banner with headline, actions for student/teacher forms, feature badges, and an image.
Four-step explanation of the tutoring process using icon cards.
Service grid showcasing subjects and areas taught with icons and descriptions.
Testimonials grid displaying student reviews with star ratings and author info.
Renders a marketing stats section showing experience, student count, and teacher count using cards with icons.
Displays four value propositions with icons and descriptions in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/config/publicDomain.ts: Provides utilities to get the public domain, full URLs, and asset URLs based on environment variables and fallbacks.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Defines the site name and helpers for generating page titles and accessing branding information.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Exports structured Terms & Conditions content with sections dynamically referencing the site name.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Supplies marketing copy including hero text, value propositions, services, steps, and testimonials using SITE_NAME.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Contains contact info, form option lists, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs for use across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty or placeholder file for a custom cursor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login flow, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD blog operations, user profile actions, and admin checks through the canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme configuration with light/dark mode variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp, SMS, phone, and email links with templated messages for student and teacher inquiries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing blogs with create, edit, publish, delete, and site-live controls.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Admin setup screen for initializing admin access, saving email, validating tokens, and displaying identity details.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with loading, not-found, and published checks, using metadata hooks and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blog posts with loading and empty states, including previews and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact options including WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email with links and actions driven by site config.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage composed of multiple marketing sections and sets page metadata.
Standalone marketing landing page that manually sets meta tags and renders marketing sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Provides a setup checklist for configuring site settings, domain, logo, contacts, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form with page metadata and introductory text.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Displays the teacher registration form with metadata and header text.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders terms and conditions content dynamically from legalContent with metadata.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method for authorization setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Standalone HTML landing page with domain-configured asset loading, dynamic logo/UTM updates, and full page structure and navigation.
Explains the standalone landing page structure and how to run it via direct browser opening or a local static server.
Defines all editable marketing content for the standalone page, including hero text, value props, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQs.
Contains all styling for the standalone landing page, including layout, components, typography, colors, and responsive design.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the main React app.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, domain requirements, existing features, and pending requests, focused on using growithtutor.com as the public domain.
